metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21031 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In setPowerMode of HWC2.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a race condition. This could lead to local information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-13Android ID: A-242688355

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-native package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
